title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio built with React and Tailwind CSS.

title: Messaging App
description: A web application that allows users to sign up, create a personal profile, and send messages in individual or group chats. Authentication and authorization implemented using Passport-local, Passport-jwt, and jsonwebtoken.

title: Blog API
description: A blogging platform with general view for non-logged-in users and full view with comments for registered users.

title: File Uploader
description: A file uploader for authenticated users who can perform CRUD operations with folders. Authentication implemented using PassportJS.

title: Memory Card Game
description: A memory game using Simpsons GIFs instead of images.

title: Shopping Cart
description: A classic e-commerce site to search for products and add them to a shopping cart. FakeAPI was used to populate the site.

title: Public Works Analysis
description: A system to perform data analysis with a database sourced from the Government of Buenos Aires.
